timeline.message:
Don't remove pnpm-lock on node and npm validation (#7604)

* Don't remove pnpm-lock on node and npm validation

Fixes #7593

* Update Chrome version

Avoid calling mx bean to get a file name unique for JVM (#7601)

* Avoid calling mx bean to get a file name unique for JVM

Fixes #7555

* Exclude lazy init class from serializable test

Delete node_modules if it's structure doesn't match the current tool. (#7609)

Fixes #7528

Keep a hard reference to ReflectionCache clear action (#7613)

Fixes #7549

Force using node from vaadin  home folder (#7605)

Fixes #7563

# Conflicts:
#	flow-maven-plugin/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/plugin/maven/BuildFrontendMojo.java
#	flow-maven-plugin/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/plugin/maven/FlowModeAbstractMojo.java
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/FrontendUtils.java
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/NodeTasks.java

Accept a flow-build-info (#7607)

Even when we are running from inside a
jar if the paren jar doesn't contain
a flow-build-info we should accept a
found build info and log that we can't be
certain that this is the correct file.

Fixes #7579

# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/DeploymentConfigurationFactory.java

Fix test on windows. (#7630)

Windows node executable is node.exe

Read proxy config from .npmrc file (#7625)

* Read proxy config from .npmrc file, system properties, and environment variables

# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/DevModeHandler.java

Fix usage of non existent lang package

We don't bring with us apache
commons lang3 package.

timeline.author: vaadin-bot
vaadin-bot
